p.d: To the great frustration of Ferraille, Rita refuses to buy a new car when her 1961 Galaxie breaks down. Meanwhile, Yolande wants to persuade her friend Monette to come and live in Saint-Prospere. She asks Rita for her help... Directed by: Jean-Marc Piché (season 1, Canada, 2017) Screenplay: Patricia Léger Cast: Patricia Léger (Rita Melanson), Marie-Jo Thério (Yolande LeBlanc), Marcel-Romain Thériault (Lomer Dupuis), Marc Lamontagne (Edmour LeBlanc), Raphaël Butler (Ferraille Gaudet), Claire Normand (Gilberte Cormier), Gabriel Robichaud (Zoël Bourgeois), Bianca Richard (Terri Cormier) Genre: comedy
